com.fluidops.iwb.util

Class HTMLSanitizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.iwb.util.HTMLSanitizer

  • public class HTMLSanitizer
extends java.lang.Object
    A convenience class for HTML text that provides sanitizing functionality based on OWASP
    Author:
    as

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HTMLSanitizer() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.owasp.html.PolicyFactory defaultSanitizer()
      Returns an HTML sanitizer that allows certain elements, however, cleans up unsafe attributes.
      static org.owasp.html.PolicyFactory linkSanitizer()
      Returns an HTML sanitizer that sanitizes links.
      static java.lang.String sanitize(java.lang.String text)
      Sanitizes the given String using defaultSanitizer().
      static java.lang.String sanitizeLinks(java.lang.String text)
      Sanitizes the given String using linkSanitizer().

    • Constructor Detail

      • HTMLSanitizer

        public HTMLSanitizer()

    • Method Detail

      • defaultSanitizer

        public static org.owasp.html.PolicyFactory defaultSanitizer()
        Returns an HTML sanitizer that allows certain elements, however, cleans up unsafe attributes. In addition to basic formatting elements, this sanitizer allows blocks, style attributes, images as well as links.
        Returns:

      • linkSanitizer

        public static org.owasp.html.PolicyFactory linkSanitizer()
        Returns an HTML sanitizer that sanitizes links. Note: this sanitizer allows basic formatting elements.
        Returns:

      • sanitize

        public static java.lang.String sanitize(java.lang.String text)
        Sanitizes the given String using defaultSanitizer().
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:

      • sanitizeLinks

        public static java.lang.String sanitizeLinks(java.lang.String text)
        Sanitizes the given String using linkSanitizer(). Note: this sanitizer allows basic formatting elements.
        Parameters:
        text -
        Returns:
